name: Royal Ocean Rescue [Demo]
description:
Sail in the Western Seas of Ado

Prepare for the treacherous combat that you will be faced with. 

But most importantly make sure to save every person, because you are a  Sea Horse! 

Controls: 

Action Controls TurnA  / Left Arrow -  D / Right ArrowAccelerateW / Up Arrow - S / Down ArrowShoot/TalkSpace
